verses.verse: Judge <S%H8199><s%> me, O God, <S%H430><s%> and plead <S%H7378><s%> my cause <S%H7379><s%> against an ungodly <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2623><s%> nation: <S%H1471><s%> O deliver <S%H6403><s%> me from the deceitful <S%H4820><s%> and unjust <S%H5766><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

For you are the God <S%H430><s%> of my strength: <S%H4581><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> do you cast <S%H2186><s%> me off? why <S%H4100><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> I mourning <S%H6937><s%> because of the oppression <S%H3906><s%> of the enemy? <S%H341><s%>

O send <S%H7971><s%> out your light <S%H216><s%> and your truth: <S%H571><s%> let them lead <S%H5148><s%> me; let them bring <S%H935><s%> me to your holy <S%H6944><s%> hill, <S%H2022><s%> and to your tabernacles. <S%H4908><s%>

Then will I go <S%H935><s%> to the altar <S%H4196><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> to God <S%H410><s%> my exceeding <S%H8057><s%> joy: <S%H1524><s%> yes, on the harp <S%H3658><s%> will I praise <S%H3034><s%> you, O God <S%H430><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> are you cast <S%H7817><s%> down, <S%H7817><s%> O my soul? <S%H5315><s%> and why <S%H4100><s%> are you disquieted <S%H1993><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me? hope <S%H3176><s%> in God: <S%H430><s%> for I shall yet <S%H5750><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> him, who is the health <S%H3444><s%> of my countenance, <S%H6440><s%> and my God. <S%H430><s%>
